mainDescription.subtitle: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
mainDescription.name: Hello, I'm Antonio Delage, contact me to create
mainDescription.title: Your web application with best technologies.

item2.description1: - In my project with the Roiback client, I specialize in transitioning from Django to React and on the back-end I use Python. On the front-end, I use React with the MVC pattern, migrating from JavaScript to TypeScript to optimize the quality and readability of the code.

item3.description1: - During the first months I had the opportunity to practice with real projects at Banco Santander, receiving training in React from my company. This experience was fundamental in my professional development and allowed me to acquire solid skills in its use from React.
item3.description2: - On the other hand, in the web application development project for BBVA bank, I use litElement, JavaScript and CELLS to create high-quality and scalable UI components.

item4.description1: - In the project for HSBC UK Bank, I created 2 pages using React. I improved the user experience by implementing React Query, Redux and React Router, which resulted in a more intuitive interface.
item4.description2: - I used Sass and HTML to improve the look and feel
item4.description3: -Jest and Cypress were used to test the application.
item4.description4: - Followed SCRUM methodology and used Git to work efficiently and deliver consistent results.
item4.description5: - In terms of performance, the implementation of React Query resulted in a 40% increase in data load speed and the implementation of Redux improved data consistency by 30%. The use of React Router also improved navigation by 20%. Overall, these improvements contributed to a more satisfying user experience and higher overall performance.

item5.description1: - First project with ReactJS where I developed an application with function-based React, React Hooks and Leaflet.
item5.description2: - I used HTML, CSS to improve the appearance and aesthetics.
item5.description3: - I followed the KANBAN methodology with Azure and used Git to work efficiently and deliver consistent results.

item6.description1: - These months I had the opportunity to work on solving tickets related to the functionality of the application. This included both new feature development and bug fixing tasks.
item6.description2: - In addition to working with VanillaJS, I also used HTML and CSS to create the user interface and ensure visual consistency in the application. On the other hand, I used Git to keep version control and collaborate with other team members on development.
item6.description3: - This experience allowed me to improve my skills in developing applications with VanillaJS and how to integrate different technologies such as HTML, CSS and Git to create a complete and effective application. In addition, I learned how to work in a team and solve problems efficiently.

about.title: About me
about.item1: - Professional web application development specialized in the frontend with the React JS library.
about.item2: - Currently I am working on the development of web applications with React JS and Node JS.
about.item3: - Other technologies I'm looking forward to learn are TypeScript, GraphQL and MongoDB. I would also like to learn how to use the React Native library for mobile app development.

item1.title: Delin Open-AI
item1.subtitle: Personal project
item1.description: Smart chat app using React, UseLLM and Styled-Components, powered by secure authentication from Clerk. The app uses the OpenAI API to generate answers to user questions.

item2.title: Luxestay Hotels
item2.subtitle: Knowmad Mood
item2.description: Technical test carried out in Knowmad mood. The test consisted of creating a page where the flow of reservations for a hotel could be seen. Libraries such as React, Redux Toolkit, styled-components, Formik are used in the project.

item3.title: Cookie Clicker Game
item3.subtitle: Sectorea IT
item3.description: Technical test carried out in Sectorea. The test consisted of doing a click mini-game in 2 days. The project used technologies/libraries such as React, Redux Toolkit, i18n, Vite, Husky, styled-components and Cypress.
